resources.string:
You need a total of 90 credits to graduate: 75 from required courses and 15 from electives.

Visit your student profile, located in the "3-dot menu" to see how many credits you've taken so far.

All electives are shown in blue.

For assistance, email your Administrator:
admin@student.edu.
Additionally, you may email SaveTheStudentsLLC@gmail.com for technical support.

This app was developed by Save The Students LLC.

Current version: CS Advisor 9000 v1.3
